markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragontooth Club](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1885)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 36 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Leiomano](/Weapons.aspx?ID=292)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Dragon teeth line the edges of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [leiomano](/Weapons.aspx?ID=292)_. The leiomano also has a [_flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295), [_frost_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296), [_shock_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303), or [_corrosive_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) rune, as appropriate for the dragon from which the teeth were taken, which also grants the weapon the associated energy trait (for instance, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) for a club made with teeth taken from a [red dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=168)).

<document level="2" id="action-1578" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include teeth from a dragon with a breath weapon that deals acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragontooth Club
